gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 117, Hornets 110
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bulls defeated the Hornets, 117-110. Coby White led the way for the Bulls with a season-high 35 points, along with seven rebounds and nine assists, while Nikola Vucevic added 22 points and 12 rebounds in the victory. Miles Bridges tallied 30 points, 15 rebounds and five assists for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Bulls improve to 23-26 on the season, while the Hornets fall to 10-36.
